item.description:
Pilobolus is a CT-based dance troupe that comes around each year and performs a free event at Hartford river front.  This is one of my favorite events of the year by the river in Hartford.  The dance troupe is fantastic and always puts on a great show.  Bring a blanket to sit on (and maybe to curl up in given the late September date) and a snack to eat and/or share. 

Visit their website to check out this Connecticut-based dance troupe's work. 

http://www.pilobolus.com/home.jsp

 

In case of rain, please check the riverfront.org website to see the status of this event.  I will also try to update the meetup page. 

I've added my cell number to my RSVP.  If you are having trouble finding the group on the day of the event, please feel free to contact m.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the top of the stairs that go down toward the stage at 7pm.
item.name: Pilobolus
